assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nice Corporation imports, distributes, and sells building materials for housing in Japan and internationally. It engages in the manufacture, processing, and sale of wood products; lumbering and processing of wood; development and sale of solar power generation systems and storage batteries; wholesale of lumber products, structural structures, and housing equipment; and provision of mortgage consultation and insurance services. The company is also involved in the construction and sale of single-family houses, detached houses, seismic isolation structures, wooden buildings, and housing for the elderly, as well as custom-built houses, including shrines and temples; brokerage, management, and rental of condominiums; design, construction, an mediation of construction and contracting works; real estate sale and lease, and interior construction and renovation activities; and provision of housing consultation services. In addition, it engages in the development and sale of software for the wood and housing industry; collecting, processing, and providing information; operation and management of housing history; and freight forwarding and warehousing, building equipment management, cleaning, nursing care, cable TV, and internet and landline businesses. The company was formerly known as Nice Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Nice Corporation in March 2020. Nice Corporation was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Yokohama, Japan.
